Package controllers

Class BTOApplicationCTRL

java.lang.Object
controllers.BTOApplicationCTRL
public class BTOApplicationCTRL extends Object
Controller class for managing BTO applications in the BTO system.

Handles application submission, withdrawal, approval/rejection, booking, and report generation. Provides role-based application menus for applicants, officers, and managers.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BTOApplicationCTRL(User currentUser)
    Loads all applications and projects, and keeps track of the logged-in user.

  • Constructor Details

    • BTOApplicationCTRL

      public BTOApplicationCTRL(User currentUser)
      Loads all applications and projects, and keeps track of the logged-in user.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • runApplicationMenu

      public void runApplicationMenu(Scanner sc, UserCTRL userCTRL, BTOProjectCTRL projectCTRL, BTOApplicationCTRL applicationCTRL, BTOApplicationView btoApplicationView)
      Runs the application menu for the current user, displaying options and routing to the appropriate actions based on the user's role (applicant, officer, manager).
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner for user input.
      userCTRL - The UserCTRL instance.
      projectCTRL - The BTOProjectCTRL instance.
      applicationCTRL - This BTOApplicationCTRL instance.
      btoApplicationView - The BTOApplicationView for displaying menus and results.

    • viewUserApplications

      public List<BTOApplication> viewUserApplications()
      Shows all applications by the currently logged-in user.
      Returns:
      List of BTOApplication objects for the user.

    • apply

      public boolean apply(int projectId, FlatType flatType)
      Submits a new application for a BTO project if eligible. Only one application is allowed per user.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The project ID to apply for.
      flatType - The flat type to apply for.
      Returns:
      true if application was successful, false otherwise.

    • withdraw

      public boolean withdraw(int applicationId)
      Withdraws an application by its ID if it belongs to the current user.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The application ID to withdraw.
      Returns:
      true if withdrawal was successful, false otherwise.

    • getApplicationsHandledByManager

      public List<BTOApplication> getApplicationsHandledByManager()
      Gets all applications handled by the current manager.
      Returns:
      List of BTOApplication objects.

    • getApplicationsHandledByOfficer

      public List<BTOApplication> getApplicationsHandledByOfficer()
      Retrieves all applications for which the associated project's approved officer list contains the current officer's NRIC.
      Returns:
      List of BTOApplication objects.

    • updateApplicationStatus

      public boolean updateApplicationStatus(int applicationId, String newStatus)
      Updates the status of an application.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application to update.
      newStatus - The new status ("SUCCESSFUL" or "UNSUCCESSFUL").
      Returns:
      true if updated successfully, false otherwise.

    • processApplicationDecision

      public boolean processApplicationDecision(int appId, String decision, BTOProjectCTRL projectCTRL)
      Processes an application decision (approve or reject) for a manager.
      Parameters:
      appId - The application ID to process.
      decision - "A" for approve, "R" for reject.
      projectCTRL - The BTOProjectCTRL instance.
      Returns:
      true if processed successfully, false otherwise.

    • bookApplication

      public boolean bookApplication(int applicationId, BTOProjectCTRL projectCTRL)
      Books a flat for a successful application and updates the application status to BOOKED.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The application ID to book.
      projectCTRL - The BTOProjectCTRL instance.
      Returns:
      true if booking was successful, false otherwise.

    • getApplicationById

      public BTOApplication getApplicationById(int applicationId)
      Gets an application by its ID.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The application ID.
      Returns:
      The BTOApplication object, or null if not found.

    • getProjects

      public List<BTOProject> getProjects()
      Gets the list of all BTO projects.
      Returns:
      List of BTOProject objects.

    • bookAndGenerateReceipt

      public boolean bookAndGenerateReceipt(int appId, BTOProjectCTRL projectCTRL, UserCTRL userCTRL)
      Books a successful application and generates a receipt for the applicant.
      Parameters:
      appId - The application ID to book.
      projectCTRL - The BTOProjectCTRL instance.
      userCTRL - The UserCTRL instance.
      Returns:
      true if booking and receipt generation were successful, false otherwise.

    • approveWithdrawalApplication

      public boolean approveWithdrawalApplication(int appId, BTOProjectCTRL projectCTRL)
      Approves a withdrawal application and updates flat availability.
      Parameters:
      appId - The withdrawal application ID.
      projectCTRL - The BTOProjectCTRL instance.
      Returns:
      true if withdrawal was approved, false otherwise.

    • generateReport

      public List<BTOApplication> generateReport(MaritalState maritalFilter, String flatTypeFilter, Integer minAge, Integer maxAge, String neighbourhoodFilter, List<BTOProject> allProjects, UserCTRL userCTRL)
      Generates a filtered report of all applicants under projects handled by the current manager.
      Parameters:
      maritalFilter - Marital status filter.
      flatTypeFilter - Flat type filter.
      minAge - Minimum age filter.
      maxAge - Maximum age filter.
      neighbourhoodFilter - Neighbourhood filter.
      allProjects - List of all BTO projects.
      userCTRL - The UserCTRL instance.
      Returns:
      List of filtered BTOApplication objects.
